alert.note: Alert for Elbert, Central and East Douglas Counties Above 6000 Feet; North and Northeast Elbert County Below 6000 Feet, North Lincoln County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 6:21PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Elbert and north central Lincoln Counties through 700 PM MDT... At 620 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Matheson, or 17 miles west of Limon, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Limon, Hugo, Simla, Genoa and Matheson. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM MDT for east central Colorado.
